definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Absolute equalitarianism became quite serious in the Red Army at one time.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍中的絕對平均主義，有一個時期發展得很厲害。

sentences.english: It only makes sense in an era of judicial egalitarianism .
sentences.chinese: 它只是一個時代意義的司法平均主義。

sentences.english: This is the vision of egalitarianism.
Both systems are characterized by their highly-centered planned distribution as well as obvious equalitarian tendency.
sentences.chinese: 其特徵是高度集中的計劃分配和嚴重的平均主義傾向。

sentences.english: It inculcated universal asceticism and social levelling in its crudest form.
sentences.chinese: 這種文獻倡導普遍的禁慾主義和粗陋的平均主義。
